title: MAYHEM AT MATTAKKULIYA: ALL POLICE OFFICERS TRANSFERRED
content: July 04, 2010: All police officers, who had been on duty at the Mattakkuliya police station when a tense situation arose there last night, have been transferred. Police had arrested about 100 suspects over the incident and some of them were produced before M. M. Mohamed, Colombo Additional Magistrate, who ordered them detained with the…
